title: Load a VOTable by URL
js:
var aladin = A.aladin('#aladin-lite-div', {survey: 'P/DSS2/red', target: 'LMC', fov: 5});
aladin.addCatalog(A.catalogFromURL('http://vizier.u-strasbg.fr/viz-bin/votable?-source=HIP2&-c=LMC&-out.add=_RAJ,_DEJ&-oc.form=dm&-out.meta=DhuL&-out.max=9999&-c.rm=180', {sourceSize:12, color: '#f08080'}));
